resources.string:
EatGreen is a local health food restaurant dedicated to promoting healthy eating and sustainable living.
We believe that nutritious food should be both accessible and enjoyable.\n
Our menu is carefully crafted to offer fresh, high-quality ingredients while ensuring that our meals
are balanced and nutritious. We also provide dietary information, including calorie counts, to help
our customers make informed food choices.
Address: 123 Main Street\n Phone: +44 1234 567890\n Email: EatGreen@gmail.com
